intro: This public analysis report explains the biggest gluten risks in Worcestershire Sauce and how to order more safely.

verdict.summary: Worcestershire sauce may contain gluten due to the presence of ingredients like malt vinegar and certain flavorings. It's important to check labels or inquire about specific brands to ensure they are gluten-free.

disclaimer: This guidance is informational only. Always verify ingredients and preparation with the restaurant.

sections.title: Quick answer
sections.body: Worcestershire Sauce can vary by recipe, ingredients, and cross-contact controls in the kitchen.

sections.title: Common gluten risks
sections.body: Watch for hidden sources like soy sauce, malt flavoring, marinades, thickeners, and shared fryers.
